channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA
channel.description: Translated Alerts from Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟡 23:19 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community
item.description: 🟡 23:19 Alarm lifted in Kharkiv region. Please note, the alarm is still ongoing in:- Kupyansky district- Lipetsk territorial community- Vovchansk territorial community#Kharkiv_region This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.

item.title: 🔴 22:45 Air alert in Kyiv region. Stay tuned for further messages.

item.title: 🔴 22:44 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter!
item.description: 🔴 22:44 Threat of artillery shelling! Now in the city Marganets and the Marganets territorial community are under artillery fire. Take shelter! This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent air-based attack or other threat.
